chapters.title: The Noble King
chapters.description: Introduce King Shibi, known for his unparalleled compassion and righteousness.

chapters.title: The Dove’s Plea
chapters.description: A dove seeks refuge with King Shibi, fleeing from a hawk, who claims it as his rightful prey.

chapters.title: Shibi’s Dilemma
chapters.description: King Shibi faces the moral challenge of protecting the dove while honoring the hawk’s needs.

chapters.title: The Ultimate Sacrifice
chapters.description: Shibi offers his own flesh to satisfy the hawk’s hunger and save the dove.

chapters.title: Divine Revelation
chapters.description: The hawk and dove reveal themselves as gods, testing Shibi’s virtues, and bless him for his selflessness.
